bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Bulletproof.

Abilities:
-Bulletproof: You will not die from lethal attacks.
-1-shot: You can only use your ability once during the game.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Bodyguard.

Abilities:
-Bodyguard: During the nights you may visit a player, if that player is attacked you will die in their place

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

doctor.name: Doctor
doctor.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Doctor.

Abilities:
-Protect: During the nights you may visit a player and protect that player from all lethal attacks.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

two_shot_cop.name: Town 2-Shot Cop
two_shot_cop.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town 2-Shot Cop.

Abilities:
-Investigate: During the night you may visit a player and get a report on their alignment in the form of “Guilty”, “Not-Guilty” or “No Result”.
-2-shot: You may only use your ability twice during the game.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

cop.name: Town Cop
cop.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Cop.

Abilities:
-Investigate: During the night you may visit a player and get a report on their alignment in the form of “Guilty”, “Not-Guilty” or “No Result”.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

deputy.name: Town Deputy
deputy.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Deputy.

Abilities:
-Investigate: During the night you may visit a player and get a report on their alignment in the form of “Guilty”, “Not-Guilty” or “Proven”.
-Deputy: You may not use your ability until the cop has died.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

tracker.name: Town Tracker
tracker.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Tracker.

Abilities:
-Track: During the night you may visit a player and will get a report of who they visit during the night.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

watcher.name: Town Watcher
watcher.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Watcher.

Abilities:
-Watch: During the night you may visit a player and will get a report of who visits that player.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

bomb.name: Town Bomb
bomb.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Bomb.

Abilities:
-Bomb: If you are killed during the night, you will kill your killer.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

one_shot_vigilante.name: Town 1-Shot Vigilante
one_shot_vigilante.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town 1-Shot Vigilante.

Abilities:
-Kill: During the night you may kill a player.
-1-shot: You may only use your ability once during the game

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

two_shot_vigilante.name: Town 2-Shot Vigilante
two_shot_vigilante.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town 2-Shot Vigilante.

Abilities:
-Kill: During the night you may kill a player.
-2-shot: You may only use your ability twice during the game

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

vigilante.name: Town Vigilante
vigilante.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Town Vigilante.

Abilities:
-Kill: During the night you may kill a player.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

vanilla_townie.name: Vanilla Townie
vanilla_townie.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities:
-You have no special abilities; your ability is your vote and voice.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

miller.name: Vanilla Townie
miller.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities:
-You have no special abilities; your ability is your vote and voice.

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

mafia_goon.name: Mafia Goon
mafia_goon.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Goon.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_strongman.name: Mafia Strongman
mafia_strongman.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Strongman.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Strongkill: You may use the factional kill in addition to your strongkill ability to kill a player, no matter what.
2-shot: You may only use your ability twice during the game.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_godfather.name: Mafia Godfather
mafia_godfather.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Godfather.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Godfather: On Cop reports you show up as “Not-Guilty”.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_hooker.name: Mafia Hooker
mafia_hooker.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Hooker.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Roleblock: During the night you may roleblock a player, which will block their action during the night.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_bulletproof.name: Mafia Bulletproof
mafia_bulletproof.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Bulletproof.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Bulletproof: You will not die from lethal attacks.
-1-shot: You can only use your ability once during the game.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_jailer.name: Mafia Jailer
mafia_jailer.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Jailer.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Jail: During the night you may Jail a player, which will make that player blocked and untargetable.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_two_shot_janitor.name: Mafia 2-Shot Janitor
mafia_two_shot_janitor.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia 2-Shot Janitor.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Janitor: You may use the factional kill in addition to your janitor ability to make a player’s role not show up upon death if they die that night.
-2-shot: You may only use your ability twice during the game.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_neapolitan.name: Mafia Neapolitan
mafia_neapolitan.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Neapolitan.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Neapolitan: During the night you may investigate a player and decide if they’re Vanilla Townie or not.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_doctor.name: Mafia Doctor
mafia_doctor.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Doctor.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Protect: During the nights you may visit a player and protect that player from all lethal attacks.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_rolecop.name: Mafia Rolecop
mafia_rolecop.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Rolecop.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Role-Investigate: During the night you may visit a player and get a report on what the role they possess.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

mafia_watcher.name: Mafia Watcher
mafia_watcher.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Mafia Watcher.

Abilities:
-Factional kill: During the night one of the faction-members may kill a player.
-Factional Communication: During the night you may communicate with your faction-members.
-Watch: During the night you may visit a player and will get a report of who visits that player.
-Unwatchable: As long as you use your watch-ability, you will not appear in any report made by other Watcher.

Win Condition: You win when the Mafia controls at least half of the votes, and all the threats to the Mafia has been eliminated.

serial_killer.name: Serial Killer
serial_killer.description:
Welcome to PISK. You are a Serial Killer.

Abilities:
-Kill: During the night you may kill a player.
-Choice: During the first day you must choose between either revealing as “Not-Guilty” on Cop Reports or being 1-shot Bulletproof.

Win Condition: You are one of the last player alive, or nothing can stop you from becoming it.
